name: Decommissioned?
description:
In this game, you must make the choice to decommission or spare AIs. 

Use the mouse to point and click. 

Fullscreen (bottom right corner) recommended!

Headphones recommended (warning: the death sound is very loud!)

This game is part of a larger project exploring how video games can be used for moral circle expansion and increasing empathy. 

We would greatly appreciate it if you could fill out the form in the link below to provide feedback and reflect on the game. 

Thank you!

Link: https://forms.gle/EUvRAZ3dWejBv6XQ7
